mapper.select: SELECT A.PRF_ID , P.ESN_ER_DATA_PK_SNO AS ER_DATA_SNO , P.COL_CNT ${colNm} FROM WAM_PRF_ERR_DATA A INNER JOIN WAM_PRF_ERR_DATA_PKDATA P ON A.PRF_ID = P.PRF_ID AND A.ANA_STR_DTM = P.ANA_STR_DTM AND A.ESN_ER_DATA_SNO = P.ESN_ER_DATA_SNO WHERE P.ESN_ER_DATA_SNO = #{erDataSno, jdbcType=VARCHAR } AND A.PRF_ID = #{objId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.ANA_STR_DTM = TO_TIMESTAMP('${objDate}','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND P.ESN_ER_DATA_PK_SNO <> 0 ORDER BY P.ESN_ER_DATA_SNO

SELECT PRF_ID AS OBJ_ID ,TO_TIMESTAMP(ANA_STR_DTM::TEXT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ANA_STR_DTM ,TO_TIMESTAMP(ANA_END_DTM::TEXT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ANA_END_DTM ,ANA_DGR ,ANA_CNT ,ESN_ER_CNT AS ER_CNT ,ANA_LOG_ID ,GET_USER_NM(ANA_USER_ID) AS ANA_USER_NM ,(CASE WHEN ANA_CNT IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE RTRIM(CASE WHEN ANA_CNT = '0' THEN '0' ELSE ROUND(ESN_ER_CNT*100/ANA_CNT,2)::VARCHAR END ,'FM9990D99') END ) AS ER_RATE FROM WAM_PRF_RESULT WHERE PRF_ID = #{objId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ANA_STR_DTM = TO_TIMESTAMP('${objDate}','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')

SELECT BR_ID AS OBJ_ID ,TO_TIMESTAMP(ANA_STR_DTM::TEXT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ANA_STR_DTM ,TO_TIMESTAMP(ANA_END_DTM::TEXT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ANA_END_DTM ,ANA_DGR ,ANA_CNT ,ER_CNT ,ANA_LOG_ID ,GET_USER_NM(ANA_USER_ID) AS ANA_USER_NM ,(CASE WHEN ANA_CNT IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE (CASE WHEN ANA_CNT = '0' THEN '0' ELSE ROUND(ER_CNT*100/ANA_CNT,2)::VARCHAR END ) END ) AS ER_RATE FROM WAM_BR_RESULT WHERE BR_ID = #{objId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ANA_STR_DTM = TO_TIMESTAMP('${objDate}','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')

SELECT COALESCE(A.COL_CNT, 0) AS COL_CNT FROM ${objResTbl} R INNER JOIN ${objErrTbl} A
ON R.PRF_ID = A.PRF_ID
ON R.BR_ID = A.BR_ID
AND TO_TIMESTAMP(R.ANA_STR_DTM::TEXT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = TO_TIMESTAMP(A.ANA_STR_DTM::TEXT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE 1=1
AND A.ESN_ER_DATA_SNO = 0
AND A.ER_DATA_SNO = 0
AND A.ESN_ER_DATA_SNO = #{erDataSno, jdbcType=VARCHAR } AND A.ESN_ER_DATA_PK_SNO = 0
AND A.PRF_ID = #{objId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.BR_ID = #{objId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND TO_TIMESTAMP(A.ANA_STR_DTM::TEXT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = TO_TIMESTAMP('${objDate}','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

SELECT A.COL_CNT ,${headerTextColNm} AS HEADER_TEXT FROM ${objResTbl} R INNER JOIN ${objErrTbl} A ON R.${objIdCol} = A.${objIdCol} AND R.ANA_STR_DTM = A.ANA_STR_DTM WHERE 1=1 AND A.${erDataSnoCol} = 0 AND A.${objIdCol} = #{objId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.ANA_STR_DTM = TO_TIMESTAMP('${objDate}','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

SELECT A.COL_CNT ,${headerTextColNm} AS HEADER_TEXT FROM ${objResTbl} R INNER JOIN ${objErrTbl} A ON R.PRF_ID = A.PRF_ID AND R.ANA_STR_DTM = A.ANA_STR_DTM WHERE 1=1 AND A.ESN_ER_DATA_PK_SNO = 0 AND A.ESN_ER_DATA_SNO = #{erDataSno, jdbcType=VARCHAR } AND A.PRF_ID = #{objId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.ANA_STR_DTM = TO_TIMESTAMP('${objDate}','YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
SELECT A.PRFC_SCRIPT FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRF_ID = #{objId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.PRFC_SCRIPT IS NOT NULL
